ser_async_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the asynchronous I/O descriptor type.

Data Fields

  • signed long forget
  • SER_CALLBACKROUTINE_T * callback_routine
  • void * callback_context

Field Documentation

signed long ser_async_t::forget

Set to TRUE if the application does not want to retrieve the result of the operation, FALSE otherwise.

SER_CALLBACKROUTINE_T* ser_async_t::callback_routine

Pointer to SER Callback routine. (Set to NULL if no callback is required).

void* ser_async_t::callback_context

Pointer to private context that the callback routine will be entered with.
